mapper.select: SELECT hno, hname, hopentime, hclosetime, hnightday, haddr, hnightendtime, hbreaktime, hbreakendtime, hholiday, hholidayendtime FROM hospital WHERE hno=#{hno}
SELECT dno, dname,dimg FROM doctor WHERE hno=#{hno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appointment (asymptomInfo, adate, aday, atime, hno, dno, mno, dpno) VALUES (#{content}, #{date}, #{day}, #{time}, #{hno}, #{dno}, #{mno}, (SELECT dpno FROM doctor WHERE hno=#{hno} AND dno=#{dno}))

INSERT INTO appointment (adate, aday, atime, hno, mno, dpno, dno) VALUES (#{date}, #{day}, #{time}, #{hno}, #{mno}, (SELECT dpno FROM department WHERE dpkind = #{dpkind}), (SELECT dno FROM doctor WHERE hno =#{hno} AND dpno = (SELECT dpno FROM department WHERE dpkind = #{dpkind})))
